author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION HONE BEGINNING ITS TURN TO THE NORTHWEST...
summary:
...TROPICAL DEPRESSION HONE BEGINNING ITS TURN TO THE NORTHWEST...
 As of 5:00 AM HST Fri Aug 30
 the center of Hone was located near 21.8, -174.7
 with movement WNW at 8 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.
